languages.text: "Так ты обманывал своих пленителей? Прикидываясь чудовищем?"
"Is it a means of tricking your captors? Pretending to be a monster?"
languages.original_text: "Так ты обманывал своих пленителей? Прикидываясь чудовищем?"

traits.locale_text: "Is it a means of tricking your captors? Pretending to be a monster?"
"Is it a means of tricking your captors? Pretending to be a monster?"
"Is it a means of tricking your captors? Pretending to be a monster?"
"Is it a means of tricking your captors? Pretending to be a monster?"

languages.text: “你是想假装已经变成了个怪物，以此骗过那个俘虏你的人吗？”
languages.original_text: "Is it a means of tricking your captors? Pretending to be a monster?"

traits.locale_text: “你是想假装已经变成了个怪物，以此骗过那个俘虏你的人吗？”

languages.text: «¿Es para engañar a sus captores? ¿Fingía ser un monstruo?».
languages.original_text: "Is it a means of tricking your captors? Pretending to be a monster?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Es para engañar a sus captores? ¿Fingía ser un monstruo?».

languages.text: 「相手を騙す手段なのか？怪物のふりをしているのか？」
languages.original_text: "Is it a means of tricking your captors? Pretending to be a monster?"

traits.locale_text: 「相手を騙す手段なのか？怪物のふりをしているのか？」

languages.text: "Wollt Ihr so Eure Peiniger überlisten? Indem Ihr vorgebt, ein Monster zu sein?"
languages.original_text: "Is it a means of tricking your captors? Pretending to be a monster?"

traits.locale_text: "Wollt Ihr so Eure Peiniger überlisten? Indem Ihr vorgebt, ein Monster zu sein?"

languages.text: « Est-ce un moyen de tromper vos geôliers ? En faisant semblant d'être un monstre ? »
languages.original_text: "Is it a means of tricking your captors? Pretending to be a monster?"

traits.locale_text: « Est-ce un moyen de tromper vos geôliers ? En faisant semblant d'être un monstre ? »

languages.text: "Seni tutsak edenleri kandırmak için canavar taklidi mi yapıyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "Is it a means of tricking your captors? Pretending to be a monster?"

traits.locale_text: "Canavar taklidi yapmak, seni tutsak edenleri kandırmak için bir yöntem mi?"
